name: Red Baron (itch)
description:
Overview:

Red Baron is an airplane shooter made for A Game By Its Cover 2015. You play an the Red Baron, and are tasked with shooting down as many airplanes and blimps as you can. Pretty standard controls, and your airplane repairs itself while you are not shooting. Fancy. Anyway, made in a couple days, and has explosions and stuffs...

Features:

  • Explosions
  • Blimps
  • Pew pew pew

Controls:

[A/S] or [Left/Right] - Turn

[W] or [Up] - Accelerate

[Space] or [X] - Shoot

[Shift] - Toggle fullscreen

[Esc] - Restart room

A Game a Week [Week 5]:

This game is my fifth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang). Stay tuned!
